 study with Wakefield explores attitudes towards flexibility at work. |94% Of Workers Want This Benefit (And Most Leaders Are Screwing It Up)
In a recent Deloitte survey of 1,000 white-collar workers, 94% of respondents said they would benefit from one thing: workplace flexibility, in the form of remote work and flexible hours.

@DeloitteIndia
, in a conversation with 
@ShereenBhan
.
